summary: The prevalence of sexual violence on college campuses, including rape and other forms of sexual coercion, can be difficult to measure. Some colleges have surveyed students to better understand the issue of sexual violence on their campuses. Researchers and others told us surveys can help colleges gather more comprehensive information about campus sexual violence, but cautioned that such surveys can be difficult and expensive to...
title: Higher Education: Approaches and Strategies Used in College Campus Surveys on Sexual Violence
